name: phpstan-vscode
description: PHPStan language server and inline error provider

phpstan.binCommand.description: PHPStan command. Use this instead of "binPath" if, for example, the phpstan binary is in your path

phpstan.configFile.description: Path to the config file (leave empty to disable, use a comma-separated list to resolve in order)

phpstan.paths.description: Path mapping for scanned files. Allows for rewriting paths for for example SSH or Docker.

phpstan.options.description: Extra commandline options to be passed to PHPStan. Supports substituting ${workspaceFolder}

phpstan.enableStatusBar.description: Show the status bar while scanning

phpstan.enabled.description: Whether to enable the on-save checker

phpstan.projectTimeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for a full project check. After this time the checking process is canceled

phpstan.suppressTimeoutMessage.description: Stop showing an error when the operation times out

phpstan.showProgress.description: Stop showing an error when the operation times out

phpstan.enableLanguageServer.description: Enable language server that provides on-hover information. Disable this if you have a custom PHPStan binary that runs on another filesystem (such as Docker). Does not work with PHPStan Pro enabled or for PHPStan version < 1.8.0.

phpstan.ignoreErrors.description: An array of regular expressions to ignore in PHPStan's error output. If PHPStan outputs some warnings/errors in stderr that can be ignored, put them in here and they'll no longer cause the process to exit with an error.

phpstan.suppressWorkspaceMessage.description: Stop showing an error when using a multi-workspace project

phpstan.pro.description: Use PHPStan Pro under the hood (if you have a license)

phpstan.proTmpDir.description: Path to the PHPStan Pro TMP directory. Defaults to PHPStan's default (which is /tmp/phpstan-fixer)

commands.title: PHPStan: Open PHPStan Pro in browser

scripts.prepack: yarn generate-package && yarn prettier --check client server && yarn lint && yarn compile && yarn run build
scripts.build:main: yarn --cwd server build && yarn --cwd client build
scripts.build-debug:main: yarn --cwd server build-debug && yarn --cwd client build-debug
scripts.build-debug:attach-server: rimraf ./out && yarn --cwd server build-debug:attac-server && yarn --cwd client build-debug
scripts.format-staged: (git diff --ignore-submodules --quiet && yarn format) || pretty-quick client server
scripts.generate-package: generate-package-json generate --input shared/commands/defs.ts -w -p package.json --handler client/src/lib/commands.ts --validate --name PHPStan --prefix PHPStan && prettier --write package.json
scripts.prepush: yarn generate-package && yarn format-staged && yarn lint --fix && yarn compile
scripts.dev: yarn devYarn && cd test/demo && composer install && cd ../../php && composer install && cd vendor/phpstan && git clone https://github.com/phpstan/phpstan-src
